name: Tejuino Margarita
description: Tejuino Margarita is an mexican drink made by the second generation of Cerrillos Hernandez Family. It is a combination of two traditional drinks: Tequila and Tejuino.
directions: Put all ingredients except the salt and corn in a mixing glass with ice cubes
Shake it for 15 seconds and drain it in another glass
Rim the glass with grasshopper salt
Add the tatemado corn to the drink
Enjoy a drink made of two traditional drinks!
